alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 7:57AM PDT until April 03 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions through the morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The higher snow accumulations will occur on grass and dirt surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
